TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlIgnoreAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指示 的 方法不序列化公共字段或公共读/写属性值。

span.span: Instructs the method of the not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化对象。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 如果将应用任何成员的类，忽略成员序列化或反序列化类的实例时。If you apply the to any member of a class, the ignores the member when serializing or deserializing an instance of the class. 类似的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 你可以重写行为引起通过创建对象，并设置其属性`false`。You can override the behavior caused by the by creating an object, and setting its property to `false`. 你必须到的实例的对象类。You must the object to an instance of the class. 最后，你必须使用要构造的实例对象类你在调用之前或方法。Lastly, you must use the object to construct an instance of the class before you call the or methods. [XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)偶尔生成从架构文件 (.xsd) 创建类时。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) occasionally generates the when creating classes from a schema file (.xsd). 出现此行为是因为值类型不能设置为`null`，但可以是所有的 XML 数据类型。This behavior occurs because value types cannot be set to `null`, but all XML data types can be. 因此，该工具将创建两个字段时遇到映射到值类型的 XML 类型： 一个用于保存值，而另一个采用的形式的特殊字段`fieldnameSpecified`，其中`fieldname`替换为字段或属性的名称。Therefore, the tool creates two fields when it encounters an XML type that maps to a value type: one to hold the value and another special field that takes the form of `fieldnameSpecified`, where the `fieldname` is replaced by the name of the field or property. 但是，请注意，仅当该架构指定了该元素没有任何最小的匹配项时，生成此特殊字段 (minOccurs ="0") 和元素，没有任何默认值。Notice, however, that this special field is generated only when the schema specifies that the element has no minimum occurrence (minOccurs = "0") and that the element has no default value. 设置，并检查此特殊的字段，以确定是否已将一个值设置为字段或属性。The sets and checks this special field to determine whether a value has been set for the field or property. 因为必须不进行序列化的特殊字段，该工具将应用到它。Because the special field must not be serialized, the tool applies the to it. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用 word`XmlIgnore`中你的代码而不是较长。You can use the word `XmlIgnore` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个名为类`Group`，其中包含名为的字段`Comment`。The following example shows a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 该示例将指定到字段，从而指示忽略该字段时序列化或反序列化类的实例。The example assigns the to the field, thereby instructing the to ignore the field when serializing or deserializing an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个名为类`Group`，其中包含名为的字段`Comment`。The following example shows a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 该示例将指定到字段，从而指示忽略该字段时序列化或反序列化类的实例。The example assigns the to the field, thereby instructing the to ignore the field when serializing or deserializing an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
